name: Brigandine: The Legend of Runersia - Collector's Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- PS4 Game: Brigandine: The Legend of Runersia
- Cloth Map 42cm x 30cm
- 52-Page Original Japanese Art Book A4
- 2 x Original Soundtrack CD
- 6 x Nations Postcard
- Large Collector's Edition Box
